WorkItem.Description:
1.  Create a plug-in
2.  Give it an Author attribute, but no Authors
3.  Navigate to Admin/Plugins
 
Expected:
Plug-in info is displayed with configured Author
 
Actual:
 
PluginInfo.ascx throws null reference exception on line:
<th><%=Model.PartialModel.GetAuthors().Length > 1 ? Model.RootModel.Localize("Plugin.Authors", "Authors") : Model.RootModel.Localize("PluginAuthor", "Author")%></th>
 
On a side note...why is there an Author and an Authors attribute?  Isn't Authors sufficient?
WorkItem.Summary: Exception thrown if Authors is not defined for plug-in
